## How to view notifications?

Notification centre is a place where staff and learners can view and manage
their received notifications. Curricula for Corporate Learning now supports
the following built-in in-system notifications: **Assessment meeting slot
reminder** , **Mark reminder** , **Meeting reminder** , and **Task overdue
reminder**.

Andy has been enrolled to a course and he wants to know if he has some tasks
to complete in the upcoming days. Let’s see how Andy will view the
notifications.

1\. In Curricula, Andy clicks the Notification button in the upper-right
corner. He will view his unread notifications.

2\. He can also click **See all** to view all his notifications.

3\. In **Notification centre** , he clicks the notification name and view the
notification details.

***Note** : If Andy wants to:

• Mark a notification as read – He can select the notification, and then click
**Mark as read**. He can also mark multiple notifications as read.

• Delete a notification – He can select the notification, and then click
**Delete**. He can also delete multiple notifications.
